testcase.name: check that guest user can create new account when he enter valid data - Example #1.1
check that guest user can create new account when he enter valid data - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given guest user opens register page........................................passed When user selects the gender "female".......................................passed And enters firstrname & lastname............................................passed And chooses DOB.............................................................passed And enter a valid Email.....................................................passed And enters pass & confirmation pass.........................................passed And press on register.......................................................passed Then new account is created successfully....................................passed
